author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
Finally after all these years the Servo browser project has been tagged with its 0.0.1 release, after a mess of an early life leading to basically the end of the project but now it has been fully revived.

title: Servo Browser Finally Hits A Major Milestone
